EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://springdays.io/?utm_source=uberflip&utm_campaign=spring-days&utm_medium=cta&utm_term=2017]]> May 30-31, 2017 1871 222 W Merchandise Mart Plaza #1212 Chicago, IL 60654
Register <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to join fellow developers from the Chicago area for a two-day community event where we will share presentations and participate in open discussions about all things Spring.
We’re rapidly advancing the Spring framework--adding flexibility to the programming model for cloud-native, reactive, and functional workloads. And we want you to be a part of it all! Don’t miss this opportunity to learn from and share with members of the Spring community.
Featured Speakers
Josh Long with Mark Heckler <[[https://pivotal.io/advocates?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> Spring team member <[[https://spring.io/team/jlong?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]>
Reactive Spring Spring Framework 5.0 is almost here! One of the most exciting introductions in this release is support for reactive programming. In this talk, we'll look at the net-new Netty-based web runtime, how existing Servlet code can run on the new world, and how to integrate it with existing Spring-stack technologies.
Michael Minella Spring team member <[[https://spring.io/team/mminella?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]>
Cloud Native Batch Processing This talk will explore the latest release of Spring Batch as well as how to utilize it in a modern cloud environment. We will work through building a cloud native batch process using Spring’s stack including Spring Batch, Spring Cloud Task, and other cloud tools.
Register now <[[https://www.springdays.io/ehome/spring-days/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-spring-days-2017]]> for $200.00 USD; space is limited and it will sell out.
Have questions, or interested in sponsoring? Please contact us at springdays@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springdays@pivotal.io]]>.
We hope to see you there, The Spring Team
